titles.title: CB 197 My glory and the lifter of my head

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
MY GLORY AND THE LIFTER OF MY HEAD,
My glory and the lifter of my head,
For Thou, O Lord, art a shield to me,
My glory and the lifter of my head.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I cried unto the Lord with my voice,
I cried unto the Lord with my voice,
I cried unto the Lord with my voice,
And He heard me out of His holy hill.
(Repeat first verse)
